posts.caption: A favorite flying friend! @jboncon on a beach in Florida with one flash. The flash lights her, and makes her pop against the sky—she does the rest, as dancers do. #throwbackthursday #thankfulthursday #sunset #dance #beach #sky #nikonambassador #D3

Looking forward to the end of November and our annual visit to #london. Lovely model @ambertutton joins us for our @NikonSchoolUK workshops soon! Have worked with Amber numerous times, and I always hope one of these days we will work together on a dedicated shoot, and not just do quick onstage portraiture. She is a wonder in front of the lens. Lighting grid here is all #speedlights, classic, familiar over and under pattern. Main above, fill below, running at about minus one EV relative to the value of the main. Beauty of this arrangement is that they are both the Ezybox Speed-Lite 2 Plus soft boxes I helped design along with @lastolitebymanfrotto. Both of these can simply stuff into your bag--extremely portable. Shot at 1/4000 at f1.4. Good solution to drop out the crowd standing behind Amber. @the photography show. #TransformationTuesday #TuesdayThoughts #TipTuesday
#TravelTuesday #TopicTuesday #portraitoftheday  #portraitphotography  #NikonAmbassador #UKNikon #D5

In #nyc for the wk for @photoplusexpo. Back on the subways which has always been, to me, a wonderful place to shoot pictures. #TransformationTuesday  #TT

Last pic to celebrate #worldballetday for the week — absolutely loved working with the Cuban dance community. #Saturdaymorning #streetphoto #picoftheday #streetphotography #NikonNoFilter @NikonUSA #Cuba #Havana #colorful #travel #NikonAmbassador #NikonD850 #dancephotography  #ballet

Flash that doesn’t look like flash. One #speedlight w a Soft box to produce a small inflection of added light. For #WednesdayWisdom from the Beijing fashion shoot. #fashion #travel #Photooftheday
#picoftheday Shooting info: 1/2000 f1.4 35mm lens #nikonambassador

In Havana, this man who ran this small shoeshine stand was amazing, friendly and full of laughter. So we brought a ballerina over as a customer. Fun ensued. She totally played the part and he immediately embraced the idea of shining pointe shoes. The warmth and decency of the Cuban people we met was truly wonderful. #WednesdayWisdom #Havana #Cuba #travel #dancephotography  #portraitphotography #photooftheday #D850  #NikonAmbassador  @NikonUSA  #NikonNoFilter

In India to teach lighting @silkinspire — thinking of lighting in faraway places, this is a favorite pic. On a jeepney in downtown Manila, the wonderful (and petite!) dancer Kris Belle Paclibar poses on the hood. She is the wife of good friend and fellow photog @jojomamangunphoto #TransformationTuesday  #TravelTuesday #TuesdayMotivation #picoftheday #dancephotography #NikonNoFIlter #D800E #TipTuesday #nikonambassador #TuesdayTreat (for the senses and an explosion of color as we turned Jo-Jo into a hood ornament!) Travelling today for a long while and arrived in #bangalore In the wee hours, and thought of this set up. I will be giving a talk about keeping motivated and inspired and it always comes back to shooting dance for me.

Continuing with the many looks and moods of Ol’ha, aka, @beautiful__weirdoo. Was on location in Milan a few years back, which of course is always beautiful, even on Monday mornings. #MondayMorning #MondayMotivation #MondayMood #fashion #fashionphotography #stylish #lookoftheday #Milan #Italy #LastolitebyManfrotto  #photooftheday  @lastolitebymanfrotto #D810 #nikonambassador @gitzoinspires

From a single jazz man yesterday to what might be the largest group of jazz musicians in one spot. Shot at Silvercup Sound Stages in Queens. My editor at LIFE, @danokrent loved jazz so we invited an illustrious group to the studio. Lots of light! Had to use lots of power to get f16 on a medium format camera. About 30,000 to 40,000 watt seconds of flash. First into umbrellas then through 20x20 silks. How to get their attention? One musician brought his instrument and when I shouted “Hit it!” He started to play. Musicians all, they forgot about the photos and went with the tune. #TransformationTuesday  #TT
#TakeMeBackTuesday
#TipTuesday
#TuesdayVibes
#TuesdayTunes
#TopicTuesday

Last day in #NYC for #PPE2018, so a #nyc shot in the Bronx on a subway platform. Nick is a terrific character actor in the city. Lit w the Lastolite Speedlite 2 Soft Box. Best small light shaper I’ve ever used. Produces good, punchy light that has character and dimension. #SaturdayMorning  #portraitphotography #portraits #D5 #NikonAmbassador  #picoftheday #streetphoto  #streetphotography @PhotoPlusExpo @Lastolite  On stage at the @NIKONUSA booth today at 3:30pm and then 2 quick lighting demos - 11:15am and 3:15pm. Check out @nikonusa livestream.

For #FlashbackFriday —ballet on the rooftop and not just any rooftop. This was Jay Maisel’s legendary roof in lower Manhattan. All Speedlights up there in line of sight mode. Fun with gels as well. #D3x  #fridayfeeling #dancephotography #worldballetday #ballet #NYC #picoftheday #FBF #NikonAmbassador

Shot from a Kelby Training video from a long time ago! #FlashbackFriday #NikonD700 #NikonAmbassador #fridayfeeling #fridaymotivation #picoftheday @KelbyOne  Similar gesture to yesterday’s post shot in a studio, but much different lighting treatment and location! Flash assisted sunset light. Important to keep experimenting w light and location.

Heading to @photoplusexpo this week. This shot of @iamcandicelam was made in 2016 as a demo shot for a class. Quick setup, two lights. Candice was a trooper! We left the classroom and went outside for this. Lots of fun to do, lighting on the fly. #SaturdayMorning #SaturdayStyle
#portaitoftheday #picoftheday
#portraitphotography #NYC @NikonUSA #NikonAmbassador #D5 #PPEWorkshop

Light and shadow in the studio, done w Speedlights. Playing w light, and always a pleasure to photograph Jasmine who is wonderful in front of the camera. #ThrowbackThursday #ThursdayThoughts #NikonAmbassador #Photooftheday #fashion #tbt

Continuing outside the coffee shop, during the day, in Milan, with the Ohla, our model —@beautiful_weirdoo — Love to shoot on the street, especially this way, with 3 Speedlites into one source, the Lastolite four in one. Big soft source, TTL, enough power to cover the foreground.  Leave for the UK today, and will be photographing models in the street, such as @ambertutton, with the great group @ nikonschooluk.  #saturdaymorning #fashion #style #Milan #portraitphotography #saturdaystyle #lookofthday #fashionphotography #LastolitebyManfrotto #portraitoftheday  #picoftheday  @GitzoInspires  @LastolitebyManfrotto  #D810 f/2.8  1/800  70-200 at 105mm

Little known fact as we are all wrapped up in #blackfriday. Today is also #nationalespressoday. The two go hand in hand, don’t you think? Though it would be hard, perhaps, today, to find the serenity of this lovely Milan coffee shop out there in the wilds of sales and stores on a day like today. #D810 @ f1.4, 1/40th 35mm lens #portraitoftheday  #picofthday  #portraitphotography  #lastolitebymanfrotto  @gitzoinspires  @lastolitebymanfrotto  #coffee  #espresso  #fashion

For #MondayMemories Just shared a Cuba dance film and some stills during #PPE2018 and thought of this pic of an extraordinary dancer for  #MotivationMonday Have a great start to the week everyone! #portraitphotography #dancephotography #D850  #NikonAmbassador  #picoftheday @NikonUSA #travel #Havana #dance

One of my favorite portraits ever for #Caturday and #TrainYourBrainDay. Also, just a nice feel for a foggy, soft light morning here at home. #SaturdayMorning. Famed two time Nobelist Linus Pauling, on his ranch on the California coast. Shot many years ago for Discover magazine. One of the wonderful things about shooting for that magazine is you had access to genius. #portraitoftheday #academic  #portraitphotography #pictureoftheday #nobelprize #genius #teacher

Kickboxing world champion @alfierdavis shows his intensity posing for a portrait during our @NikonSchoolUK workshop last year. #MondayMotivation. Teaching a new action portraiture workshop this year outside of London with the folks at @NikonSchoolUK in a few weeks! Plus two workshops in London. https://nikonschool.co.uk/courses
#MondayMorning  #portraitoftheday  #picoftheday #portraitphotography #streetphotography #NikonAmbassador #UKNikon @lastolitebymanfrotto @alfiedaviskickboxing

Wonderful model shot some years ago for @kelbyonepics onstage at the Javits actress. In #nyc — where I’ll b this week w @nikonusa for @photoplusexpo - For #WednesdayWisdom.... #NYCPortait  #portraitphotography #D3 #NikonAmbassador #picoftheday #manhattan

For #thursdaythoughts and #DayoftheGirl it was a privilege to recently photograph Sallie B. Howard at the age of 102. Daughter of a sharecropper, she grew up to be a wonderful educator, spending over two decades teaching in the @nyc school system. She was a formidable force educating young people everywhere she went, but in particular, she was an amazing and positive role model for young girls. Sadly, she just passed away, but she lived a life that is revered. Her namesake school in Wilson, NC, The Sallie B. Howard School for the Arts and Education, continues to keep her legacy alive, educating and shaping the lives of young people. One of the truly beautiful things about being a photog is to meet people like Sallie, who was a beacon to young girls and boys, and a joy to be around.  @educator #education #teachers #ThursdayVibes #ThursdayMotivation #ThankfulThursday #picoftheday #portraitphotography #NikonAmbassador

For #sundaymorning —Traveling far and wide this coming week. Heading to India for #silkinspire Harking back to lighting on the street in #Hong Kong and teaching lighting in far flung places. W #evontan in downtown HK. #travel #fashion #colorful #portraitphotography #D3S #NIkonAmbassador #NikonNoFilter @nikonusa @silkinspire

Back home from NOLA, the city of music everywhere. When you walk the quarter, the music from one joint fades but another kicks right in when you turn a corner. It was a natural a few years back to photograph Little Freddie King, the self titled “King of the Blues” in New Orleans, on the banks of the Mississippi. Shot with Nikon D4 and a 24-70mm lens, 1/2.5 sec. at f4. The combo of flash duration, and bracing my elbows on the ground for an impromptu tripod effect made up for the fact that we were super late getting to this location, and the sun was down and out of the sky. #tiptuesday #tuesdaythoughts  #picoftheday @photooftheday  #traveltuesday  #tuesdayvibes  #traveltuesday  #nikonambassador  #nikonlove #nikonnofilter @nikonusa #neworleans #nola

Camera, action, light and shadow! Looking forward to shooting athletes outdoors this week here in the UK with the team from @NikonUK. Speedliting outdoors. My assistant is holding light, concealed by the shadow of the street light pole. Faint shadow on the wall? Two lights at play—the sun and a speedlight. 😳#TransformationTuesday  #TipTuesday #TuesdayThoughts
#TopicTuesday #photooftheday #streetphotography #shadows @NikonUSA #NikonAmbassador

Out and about in NOLA. Musician Jimmy Williams on the streets of the French Quarter. #z7 is very adaptable to all manner of shooting, esp. light and fast, available light roaming. @nikonusa #nikonambassador #nikonlove #saturdaymorning #tuba #music Z7, Z series 24-70mm lens.

From a huge group shot to a “Don’t forget the details” shot for #WednesdayWisdom - “Entire to Detail”  Hands of Chris Robertson w guitar. Got the chance to work with a super talented band @blackstonecherryofficial a few summers back. When shooting monochrome I program the camera for monochrome. Helps to see in B&W. #music  #wednesdaythoughts #NikonAmbassador @NikonUSA #picoftheday #photooftheday #blackandwhitephotography #NikonNoFilter #D7200 #85mm

Kindness, dignity and compassion define @horsesforheroes  and the work they do with veterans. Out on the plains with Nancy De Santis in New Mexico. Used a small, gridded strip soft box here off to camera right. Just an inkling of flash. https://www.horsesforheroes.org  #TuesdayThoughts #WorldKindnessDay #horse #SantaFe #sunset #TransformationTuesday #TravelTuesday #TopicTuesday #TipTuesday #MirrorlessReinvented #Z7 @NikonUSA #NikonNoFilter #NikonAmbassador

Currently shooting a group of portraits around the country. This is Nancy De Santis, of New Mexico, long time friend and an amazing presence in front of the lens. Stormy skies in NM are always a good backdrop for a portrait. Shot with the @nikonusa Z7 with the Z series 24-70mm lens. #picoftheday #FeatureFriday  #Z7 #mirrorlessreinvented @horsesforheroes

Heading over to @photoplusexpo this morning! Doing a presentation at 1:15 about #Z7 & a live shoot at 3:15. Will be picking potential subjects from the crowd! 😄 @nikonusa #speedlights ##ThursdayThoughts
#GingerThursday #portraitphotography #portraits #D850 #NikonAmbassador  #picoftheday  @PhotoPlusExpo @lastolitebymanfrotto

Recently visited with Rick Iannucci and Nancy De Santis, who together run a wonderful program where they pair magnificent horses with veterans. It’s a privilege to know Rick and Nancy and to see the work being done @horsesforheroes - Thanks to them and all the veterans who have sacrificed so much on our behalf.  https://www.horsesforheroes.org  #VeteransDay #SkySunday #travel #horse #SantaFe #NikonAmbassador @NikonUSA #Z7 #NikonNoFilter #MirrorlessReinvented Shooting info: NIKKOR Z 35mm f/1.8 S lens f/10 1/320  ISO 125

In honor of Author’s Day, a portrait of legendary Irish-American writer Frank McCourt. This picture was shot in a bar, an establishment that was certainly near the heart of our friendship. Frank, his wife, Ellen, my wife Annie and I went bar hopping in Dublin the night before I asked Annie to marry me. I texted Frank the next day, “She said yes!” This bar is on the West Coast of Ireland, and it had a dark wall in between two windows, one big, one small. Which translated to me as “main light, fill light.” I asked Frank to pose and we shot it in just a couple of minutes. #AuthorsDay #ThrowbackThursday  #NikonD1X #ThankfulThursday #portraitphotography #portraitoftheday #picoftheday #Ireland #ThursdayThoughts #windowlight

Legendary Preservation Hall Band member Charlie Gabriel performs at the hall, a truly celebrated landmark place in the history of jazz. High ISO available light. #MondayMotivation

For the week we celebrate #worldballetday a #throwbackthursday post of Jen Concepcion, a truly lovely, dedicated dancer I have been fortunate to work with. Dancers are amazing—as I always say they possess the ability to physicalize your imagination. In this case, my imagination entailed about 10 or 12 Speedlights. #nikonambassador #dance #ballet #stroboscopic

Now a fashion model with wings and drama for #TransformationTuesday. Transforming a busy tourist location into a stage for a stunning model. Need to get here early! Before crowds fill this amazing monument up. #D800E 1/320 at f/8 #Beijing #China #TempleofHeaven #TransformationTuesday
#TravelTuesday #TipTuesday #fashion #picoftheday #nikonambassador

Grateful to be home and in #NYC for the next few weeks. Shot with #D750 a few years ago - late day light. Chopper pic, air views of the city never get old. #ThankfulThursday #ThursdayThoughts #NikonAmbassador @NikonUSA #photoftheday #picoftheday #aerialphotography #cityview

A favorite shot of a New Orleans music legend...Little Joe Lassiter at his drum set @preservationhall — for #throwbackthursday - enjoying this week in the #bigeasy making photographs. #ThursdayThoughts @NikonUSA #NikonNoFilter #NikonAmbassador #D4 #travel #portraitoftheday #picoftheday #neworleans #PreservationHall #drummer #jazz

Light transforms. Here, w this amazing dancer on a rooftop in Havana, we blocked her from the rays of the rising morning sun w a big light shaper and the soft light it produces. Then, w an @lastolitebymanfrotto tri-flip, using the gold side, we caught some of that light and graced her shoulder with it. Coupled w the resolution of the D850, it made for a lovely portrait of this wonderful performer. #TransformationTuesday  #TT
#TravelTuesday
#TakeMeBackTuesday
#TipTuesday
#TuesdayThoughts
#TopicTuesday #portraitphotography #picoftheday #dancephotography #Havana #Cuba #D850  #NikonAmbassador  @NikonUSA

The many looks of @iamcandicelam for #MondayMorning.  Did this shot during a quick on stage instructional in a lighting workshop @PhotoPlusExpo. Candice, as always, made my job easy by working with the camera in such a wonderful and fluid way. Three foot Octa with a fabric grid. Previous frame had too much light on her hip, so I simply moved the light higher. Beauty of the grid, it limits the spill, concentrates the light on her face, and naturally gradates to dark tones in the lower part of the frame.  #motivationalmonday  #MondayMood #MondayMemories #PPEWorkshop
#portaitoftheday #picoftheday #fashion
#portraitphotography #NYC @NikonUSA #NikonAmbassador #D5

For #sundaymorning a shot w a bit of fun as I asked one of our models to sit in on a board game. Temple of Heaven in #beijing #portaitoftheday
